title: Video2Brain - Dynamic Dreamweaver Websites - Creating Login Area
description:
Video2Brain - Dynamic Dreamweaver Websites - Creating Login Areas

An important but little-understood concept in dynamic web development is that of role-based logins. This allows different types of users to access different parts of the site; for example, basic users can access customer areas of the site, while administrators can access administrative areas. In this course from Adobe Certified Expert Candyce Mairs, youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll learn to use DreamweaverÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s features to create role-based logins, restrict page access, build an administrator area, and test everything to make sure it works. YouÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll also see how to set up a development environment and work with a database from within Dreamweaver. Along the way youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll build your skills in areas like working with PHP, adding form validation, using server behaviors, and much more.
